Title: Henry MacKay Walker
Body: MIME-Version: 1.0 Server: CERN/3.0 Date: Monday, 06-Jan-97 19:44:16 GMT Content-Type: text/html Content-Length: 1437 Last-Modified: Friday, 25-Aug-95 20:09:00 GMT Henry MacKay Walker Henry MacKay Walker Visiting Senior Lecturer Department of Computer Sciences The University of Texas at Austin Professor of Mathematics and Computer Science Department of Mathematics and Computer Science Grinnell College walker@math.grin.edu A regular, tenured member of the Grinnell College faculty, Professor Walker visits The University of Texas at Austin periodically to teach and for various professional activities.
